title: Feature : Still missing Right Mouse - SETTINGS change
author: TwobrainsOne
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
simple : on a connection option, right-mouse click and have in the menu the option to open the CONENCTION SETTINGS.

## Current Behavior
not available in current menu, only via a  BUTTON as (floating Window) for all connections.

## Possible Solution
Support this !
